name: blur-fade
description: Blur fade in and out animation.

props.name: variant
props.type: { hidden: { y: number }; visible: { y: number } }
props.description: Custom motion variants for hidden and visible states

props.name: offset
props.description: Distance offset for the slide animation in pixels

props.name: direction
props.description: Direction of the fade-in slide animation

props.name: inView
props.description: Whether to trigger animation only when element is in view

props.name: inViewMargin
props.description: Margin for the in-view intersection observer

props.name: blur
props.description: Amount of blur applied during the hidden state
